Name: Chinato Nail
Ingredients: 15 ml Mancino Vermouth di Torino Chinato
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A riff on the Rusty Nail using Barolo Chinato. Perhaps one for whisky and Negroni fans.
History: Created in 2012 by Simon Difford at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Chinato Nail contains 254 calories
